defaultForums.title: Aloha Friday
defaultForums.content: Aloha Friday everyone, I challenge you to pick up 5 pieces of trash this weekend!

defaultForums.title: Newbie
defaultForums.content: Aloha, I am new here. Where do I see my points? Mahalo

defaultForums.title: Organic Gardening Products
defaultForums.content: Which organic products do you use for your garden? I want to use the healthiest products.

defaultForums.title: Lost Event Code
defaultForums.content: I forgot the code from the clean up the other day. Can someone please send the code?

defaultForums.title: Carpooling to cleanup
defaultForums.content: Hi, I was wondering if anyone would like to carpool to the cleanup so we can reduce our CO2 emissions?

defaultForumReplies.title: Aloha Friday
replies: Aloha, I will pick up 5 pieces this weekend!
Aloha, I picked up 10 pieces this weekend

defaultForumReplies.title: Newbie
replies: Your profile should show your points!

defaultForumReplies.title: Organic Gardening Products
replies: Worm casting and greensand are my favorite fertilizer

defaultForumReplies.title: Carpooling to cleanup
replies: I love that idea! I want to carpool.
I would like to Carpool with the 3 of you!
I will carpool if anyone else wants to.
